amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the FAA restrict the use of any funding for the implementation of the New York/New Jersey/Philadelphia metropolitan area airspace redesign.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 111-219 to require that the FAA restrict the use of any funding for the implementation of the New York/New Jersey/Philadelphia metropolitan area airspace redesign.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 313 (Roll no. 622).
